YES 
FORWARD 
ATTACK  
00032 {NO, YES, FORWARD, ATTACK} Enabled;     //is this tower a prism tower? FORWARD means can support, but not attack. ATTACK means can attack but not support.

Member Function Documentation

int BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::AcquireSlaves_MultiStage ( BuildingClass *  MasterTower,
BuildingClass *  TargetTower,
int  stage,
int  chain,
int *  NetworkSize,
int *  LongestChain 
) [static] 

00084                                                                                                                             {
00085         //get all slaves for a specific stage in the prism chain
00086         //this is done for all sibling chains in parallel, so we prefer multiple short chains over one really long chain
00087         //towers should be added in the following way:
00088         // 1---2---4---6
00089         // |        \
00090         // |         7
00091         // |
00092         // 3---5--8
00093         // as opposed to
00094         // 1---2---3---4
00095         // |          /
00096         // |         5
00097         // |
00098         // 6---7--8
00099         // ...which would not be as good.
00100         int countSlaves = 0;
00101         if (stage == 0) {
00102                 countSlaves += AcquireSlaves_SingleStage(MasterTower, TargetTower, stage, (chain + 1), NetworkSize, LongestChain);
00103         } else {
00104                 BuildingExt::ExtData *pTargetData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower);
00105                 int senderIdx = 0;
00106                 while(senderIdx < pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders.Count) {
00107                         BuildingClass *SenderTower = pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders[senderIdx];
00108                         countSlaves += AcquireSlaves_MultiStage(MasterTower, SenderTower, (stage - 1), (chain + 1), NetworkSize, LongestChain);
00109                         ++senderIdx;
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         return countSlaves;
00113 }

int BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::AcquireSlaves_SingleStage ( BuildingClass *  MasterTower,
BuildingClass *  TargetTower,
int  stage,
int  chain,
int *  NetworkSize,
int *  LongestChain 
) [static] 

00116                                                                                                                             {
00117         //set up immediate slaves for this particular tower
00118 
00119         BuildingTypeClass *pMasterType = MasterTower->Type;
00120         BuildingTypeExt::ExtData *pMasterTypeData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(pMasterType);
00121         BuildingTypeClass *pTargetType = TargetTower->Type;
00122         BuildingTypeExt::ExtData *pTargetTypeData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(pTargetType);
00123 
00124         signed int MaxFeeds = pTargetTypeData->PrismForwarding.MaxFeeds;
00125         signed int MaxNetworkSize = pMasterTypeData->PrismForwarding.MaxNetworkSize;
00126         signed int MaxChainLength = pMasterTypeData->PrismForwarding.MaxChainLength;
00127 
00128         if (MaxFeeds == 0
00129                         || (MaxChainLength != -1 && MaxChainLength < chain)
00130                         || (MaxNetworkSize != -1 && MaxNetworkSize <= *NetworkSize)) {
00131                 return 0;
00132         }
00133 
00134         struct PrismTargetData {
00135                 BuildingClass * Tower;
00136                 int Distance;
00137 
00138                 bool operator < (PrismTargetData const &rhs) {
00139                         return this->Distance < rhs.Distance;
00140                 }
00141         };
00142 
00143         CoordStruct MyPosition, curPosition;
00144         TargetTower->GetPosition_2(&MyPosition);
00145 
00146         //first, find eligible towers
00147         std::vector<PrismTargetData> EligibleTowers;
00148         //for(int i = 0; i < TargetTower->Owner->Buildings.Count; ++i) {
00149         for (int i = 0; i < BuildingClass::Array->Count; ++i) {
00150                 //if (BuildingClass *SlaveTower = B->Owner->Buildings[i]) {
00151                 if (BuildingClass *SlaveTower = BuildingClass::Array->GetItem(i)) {
00152                         if (ValidateSupportTower(MasterTower, TargetTower, SlaveTower)) {
00153                                 SlaveTower->GetPosition_2(&curPosition);
00154                                 int Distance = MyPosition.DistanceFrom(curPosition);
00155 
00156                                 PrismTargetData pd = {SlaveTower, Distance};
00157                                 EligibleTowers.push_back(pd);
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160         }
00161 
00162         std::sort(EligibleTowers.begin(), EligibleTowers.end());
00163         //std::reverse(EligibleTowers.begin(), EligibleTowers.end());
00164         
00165         //now enslave the towers in order of proximity
00166         int iFeeds = 0;
00167         while (EligibleTowers.size() != 0 && (MaxFeeds == -1 || iFeeds < MaxFeeds) && (MaxNetworkSize == -1 || *NetworkSize < MaxNetworkSize)) {
00168                 BuildingClass * nearestPrism = EligibleTowers[0].Tower;
00169                 EligibleTowers.erase(EligibleTowers.begin());
00170                 //we have a slave tower! do the bizzo
00171                 ++iFeeds;
00172                 ++(*NetworkSize);
00173                 ++TargetTower->SupportingPrisms; //Ares doesn't actually use this, but maintaining it anyway (as direct feeds only)
00174                 CoordStruct FLH, Base = {0, 0, 0};
00175                 TargetTower->GetFLH(&FLH, 0, Base);
00176                 nearestPrism->DelayBeforeFiring = nearestPrism->Type->DelayedFireDelay;
00177                 nearestPrism->PrismStage = pcs_Slave;
00178                 nearestPrism->PrismTargetCoords = FLH;
00179                 nearestPrism->DestroyNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot::Active);
00180                 nearestPrism->PlayNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot::Special);
00181 
00182                 BuildingExt::ExtData *pSlaveData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(nearestPrism);
00183                 BuildingExt::ExtData *pTargetData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower);
00184                 pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.SupportTarget = TargetTower;
00185                 pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders.AddItem(nearestPrism);
00186         }
00187 
00188         if (iFeeds != 0 && chain > *LongestChain) {
00189                 ++(*LongestChain);
00190         }
00191 
00192         return iFeeds;
00193 }

signed int BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::GetSupportRange ( BuildingTypeClass *  pThis  )  

00071                                                                                     {
00072         if(this->SupportRange != 0) {
00073                 return this->SupportRange;
00074         }
00075         if(WeaponTypeClass* Secondary = pThis->get_Secondary()) {
00076                 return Secondary->Range;
00077         } else if(WeaponTypeClass* Primary = pThis->get_Primary()) {
00078                 return Primary->Range;
00079         }
00080         return 0;
00081 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::Initialize ( BuildingTypeClass *  pThis  )  

00010                                                                          {
00011         this->Enabled = NO;
00012         if (pThis == RulesClass::Instance->PrismType) {
00013                 this->Enabled = YES;
00014         }
00015         this->Targets.AddItem(pThis);
00016 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::LoadFromINIFile ( BuildingTypeClass *  pThis,
CCINIClass *  pINI 
) 

00018                                                                                                 {
00019         const char * pID = pThis->ID;
00020         if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "PrismForwarding", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00021                 if((strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "yes") == 0) || (strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "true") == 0)) {
00022                         this->Enabled = YES;
00023                 } else if(strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "forward") == 0) {
00024                         this->Enabled = FORWARD;
00025                 } else if(strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "attack") == 0) {
00026                         this->Enabled = ATTACK;
00027                 } else if((strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "no") == 0) || (strcmp(Ares::readBuffer, "false"))== 0) {
00028                         this->Enabled = NO;
00029                 }
00030         }
00031 
00032         if (this->Enabled != NO) {
00033                 if(pINI->ReadString(pID, "PrismForwarding.Targets", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00034                         this->Targets.Clear();
00035                         for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur && *cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00036                                 BuildingTypeClass * target = BuildingTypeClass::Find(cur);
00037                                 if(target) {
00038                                         this->Targets.AddItem(target);
00039                                 }
00040                         }
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 INI_EX exINI(pINI);
00044 
00045                 this->MaxFeeds.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.MaxFeeds");
00046                 this->MaxChainLength.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.MaxChainLength");
00047                 this->MaxNetworkSize.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.MaxNetworkSize");
00048                 this->SupportModifier.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.SupportModifier");
00049                 this->DamageAdd.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.DamageAdd");
00050                 this->SupportRange.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.SupportRange");
00051 
00052                 if (this->SupportRange != -1) {
00053                         this->SupportRange = this->SupportRange * 256; //stored in leptons, not cells
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 this->SupportDelay.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.SupportDelay");
00057                 this->ToAllies.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.ToAllies");
00058                 this->MyHeight.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.MyHeight");
00059                 this->BreakSupport.Read(&exINI, pID, "PrismForwarding.BreakSupport");
00060 
00061                 int ChargeDelay = pINI->ReadInteger(pID, "PrismForwarding.ChargeDelay", this->ChargeDelay);
00062                 if (ChargeDelay >= 1) {
00063                         this->ChargeDelay.Set(ChargeDelay);
00064                 } else {
00065                         Debug::Log("[Developer Error] %s has an invalid PrismForwarding.ChargeDelay (%d), overriding to 1.\n", pThis->ID, ChargeDelay);
00066                 }
00067 
00068         }
00069 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::OrphanSlave ( BuildingClass *  SlaveTower  )  [static] 

00336                                                                            {
00337         if (int PrismStage = SlaveTower->PrismStage) {
00338                 BuildingExt::ExtData *pSlaveData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(SlaveTower);
00339                 BuildingTypeClass *pSlaveType = SlaveTower->Type;
00340                 BuildingTypeExt::ExtData *pSlaveTypeData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(pSlaveType);
00341                 if (pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.PrismChargeDelay) {
00342                         //hasn't started charging yet, so can go idle immediately
00343                         SlaveTower->PrismStage = pcs_Idle;
00344                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.PrismChargeDelay = 0;
00345                         SlaveTower->DelayBeforeFiring = 0;
00346                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.ModifierReserve = 0.0;
00347                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.DamageReserve = 0;
00348                         SlaveTower->DestroyNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot::Special);
00349                         //SlaveTower->PlayNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot::Active); //do we need this?
00350                 } //else this is already charging so allow anim to continue
00351                 if (BuildingClass *TargetTower = pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.SupportTarget) {
00352                         BuildingExt::ExtData *pTargetData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower);
00353                         --TargetTower->SupportingPrisms;  //Ares doesn't actually use this, but maintaining it anyway (as direct feeds only)
00354                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.SupportTarget = NULL; //thus making this slave tower an orphan
00355                         int senderIdx = 0;
00356                         while(senderIdx < pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.Senders.Count) {
00357                                 if (BuildingClass *NextTower = pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders[senderIdx]) {
00358                                         OrphanSlave(NextTower);
00359                                         ++senderIdx;
00360                                 }
00361                         }
00362                 }
00363         }
00364 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::RemoveSlave ( BuildingClass *  SlaveTower,
bool  bCease 
) [static] 

00313                                                                                         {
00314         if (int PrismStage = SlaveTower->PrismStage) {
00315                 BuildingExt::ExtData *pSlaveData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(SlaveTower);
00316                 OrphanSlave(SlaveTower);
00317                 if (BuildingClass *TargetTower = pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.SupportTarget) {
00318                         BuildingExt::ExtData *pTargetData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower);
00319                         signed int idx = pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders.FindItemIndex(&SlaveTower);
00320                         if(idx != -1) {
00321                                 pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders.RemoveItem(idx);
00322                         }
00323                 }
00324                 if (bCease) {
00325                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.PrismChargeDelay = 0;
00326                         SlaveTower->DelayBeforeFiring = 0;
00327                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.ModifierReserve = 0.0;
00328                         pSlaveData->PrismForwarding.DamageReserve = 0;
00329                         SlaveTower->DestroyNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot::Special);
00330                         //SlaveTower->PlayNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot::Active); //do we need this?
00331                         SlaveTower->PrismStage = pcs_Idle;
00332                 }
00333         }
00334 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::SetChargeDelay ( BuildingClass *  TargetTower,
int  LongestChain 
) [static] 

00249                                                         {
00250         int ArrayLen = LongestChain + 1;
00251         DWORD *LongestCDelay = new DWORD[ArrayLen];
00252         memset(LongestCDelay, 0, ArrayLen * sizeof(DWORD));
00253         DWORD *LongestFDelay = new DWORD[ArrayLen];
00254         memset(LongestFDelay, 0, ArrayLen * sizeof(DWORD));
00255         
00256         int endChain = LongestChain;
00257         while (endChain >= 0) {
00258                 SetChargeDelay_Get(TargetTower, 0, endChain, LongestChain, LongestCDelay, LongestFDelay);
00259                 --endChain;
00260         }
00261         
00262         int temp = 0;
00263         while (temp != LongestChain) {
00264                 ++temp;
00265         }
00266 
00267         SetChargeDelay_Set(TargetTower, 0, LongestCDelay, LongestFDelay);
00268         delete [] LongestFDelay;
00269         delete [] LongestCDelay;
00270 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::SetChargeDelay_Get ( BuildingClass *  TargetTower,
int  chain,
int  endChain,
int  LongestChain,
DWORD *  LongestCDelay,
DWORD *  LongestFDelay 
) [static] 

00273                                                                                                                              {
00274         BuildingExt::ExtData *pTargetData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower);
00275         if (chain == endChain) {
00276                 if (chain != LongestChain) {
00277                         BuildingTypeExt::ExtData *pTypeData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower->Type);
00278                         //update the delays for this chain
00279                         int thisDelay = pTypeData->PrismForwarding.ChargeDelay.Get() + LongestCDelay[chain + 1];
00280                         if ( thisDelay > LongestCDelay[chain]) {
00281                                 LongestCDelay[chain] = thisDelay;
00282                         }
00283                         if ( TargetTower->DelayBeforeFiring > LongestFDelay[chain]) {
00284                                 LongestFDelay[chain] = TargetTower->DelayBeforeFiring;
00285                         }
00286                 }
00287         } else {
00288                 //ascend to the next chain
00289                 int senderIdx = 0;
00290                 while(senderIdx < pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders.Count) {
00291                         BuildingClass *SenderTower = pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders[senderIdx];
00292                         SetChargeDelay_Get(SenderTower, (chain + 1), endChain, LongestChain, LongestCDelay, LongestFDelay);
00293                         ++senderIdx;
00294                 }
00295         }
00296 }

void BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::SetChargeDelay_Set ( BuildingClass *  TargetTower,
int  chain,
DWORD *  LongestCDelay,
DWORD *  LongestFDelay 
) [static] 

00299                                                                                              {
00300         BuildingExt::ExtData *pTargetData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(TargetTower);
00301         pTargetData->PrismForwarding.PrismChargeDelay = (LongestFDelay[chain] - TargetTower->DelayBeforeFiring) + LongestCDelay[chain];
00302         int senderIdx = 0;
00303         while (senderIdx < pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders.Count) {
00304                 BuildingClass *Sender = pTargetData->PrismForwarding.Senders[senderIdx];
00305                 SetChargeDelay_Set(Sender, (chain + 1), LongestCDelay, LongestFDelay);
00306                 ++senderIdx;
00307         }
00308 }

bool BuildingTypeExt::BuildingTypeExt::cPrismForwarding::ValidateSupportTower ( BuildingClass *  MasterTower,
BuildingClass *  TargetTower,
BuildingClass *  SlaveTower 
) [static] 

00196                                                                                                    {
00197         //MasterTower = the firing tower. This might be the same as TargetTower, it might not.
00198         //TargetTower = the tower that we are forwarding to
00199         //SlaveTower = the tower being considered to support TargetTower
00200         if(SlaveTower->IsAlive) {
00201                 if(SlaveTower->ReloadTimer.Ignorable()) {
00202                         if(SlaveTower != TargetTower) {
00203                                 if (!SlaveTower->DelayBeforeFiring) {
00204                                         int SlaveMission = SlaveTower->GetCurrentMission();
00205                                         if(!SlaveTower->IsBeingDrained() && SlaveMission != mission_Attack
00206                                                 && SlaveMission != mission_Construction && SlaveMission != mission_Selling) {
00207                                                 TechnoExt::ExtData *pData = TechnoExt::ExtMap.Find(SlaveTower);
00208                                                 if (pData->IsOperated() && pData->IsPowered() && !SlaveTower->IsUnderEMP() &&!SlaveTower->IsBeingWarpedOut()) {
00209                                                         BuildingExt::ExtData *pSlaveData = BuildingExt::ExtMap.Find(SlaveTower);
00210                                                         BuildingTypeClass *pSlaveType = SlaveTower->Type;
00211                                                         BuildingTypeExt::ExtData *pSlaveTypeData = BuildingTypeExt::ExtMap.Find(pSlaveType);
00212                                                         if (pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.Enabled == YES || pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.Enabled == FORWARD) {
00213                                                                 //building is a prism tower
00214                                                                 BuildingTypeClass *pTargetType = TargetTower->Type;
00215                                                                 if (pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.Targets.FindItemIndex(&pTargetType) != -1) {
00216                                                                         //valid type to forward from
00217                                                                         HouseClass *pMasterHouse = MasterTower->Owner;
00218                                                                         HouseClass *pTargetHouse = TargetTower->Owner;
00219                                                                         HouseClass *pSlaveHouse = SlaveTower->Owner;
00220                                                                         if ((pSlaveHouse == pTargetHouse && pSlaveHouse == pMasterHouse)
00221                                                                                 || (pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.ToAllies
00222                                                                                                 && pSlaveHouse->IsAlliedWith(pTargetHouse) && pSlaveHouse->IsAlliedWith(pMasterHouse))) {
00223                                                                                 //ownership/alliance rules satisfied
00224                                                                                 CellStruct tarCoords = TargetTower->GetCell()->MapCoords;
00225                                                                                 CoordStruct MyPosition, curPosition;
00226                                                                                 TargetTower->GetPosition_2(&MyPosition);
00227                                                                                 SlaveTower->GetPosition_2(&curPosition);
00228                                                                                 int Distance = MyPosition.DistanceFrom(curPosition);
00229                                                                                 Debug::Log("[PrismForwarding] Distance=%u, SupportRange=%d\n",
00230                                                                                         Distance, pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.GetSupportRange(pSlaveType));
00231                                                                                 if(pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.SupportRange == -1
00232                                                                                         || Distance <= pSlaveTypeData->PrismForwarding.GetSupportRange(pSlaveType)) {
00233                                                                                         //within range
00234                                                                                         return true;
00235                                                                                 }
00236                                                                         }
00237                                                                 }
00238                                                         }
00239                                                 }
00240                                         }
00241                                 }
00242                         }
00243                 }
00244         }
00245         return false;
00246 }
